meta.description: Determine the optimal number of tables, chairs, and bookshelves to produce in order to maximize profit given constraints on warehouse space and production limits.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products produced by the factory

params.name: space_required
params.description: Warehouse space required for each product

params.name: min_tables
params.description: Minimum number of tables to produce

params.name: min_bookshelves
params.description: Minimum number of bookshelves to produce

params.name: max_total_items
params.description: Maximum total number of items to produce

vars.name: production
vars.description: Number of each product to produce

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum((selling_price[p] - manufacturing_cost[p]) * production[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from selling products

constraints.name: warehouse_space_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(space_required[p] * production[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total warehouse space used cannot exceed available space

constraints.name: min_tables_production
constraints.description: At least a minimum number of tables must be produced

constraints.name: min_bookshelves_production
constraints.description: At least a minimum number of bookshelves must be produced

constraints.name: max_total_production
constraints.description: Total number of items produced cannot exceed the maximum limit
